biotools.summary:
A online platform for identifying human enzyme classes via reduced amino acid cluster strategy.

Enzyme, as a kind of biocatalyst, dominates many catalytic processes such as metabolism, nutrition and energy conversion, and most of the reactions closely related to human life process are also enzyme catalytic reactions.

Identifying the 2-level antimicrobial peptides using reduced acid amino composition.
